modName: Mirage - RaceMenu and UUNP BodySlide Preset - DELETED
summary: Mirage is a RaceMenu preset, that comes with her own UUNP BodySlide.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/BpZMgDM.jpg[/img][/center]
[color=#ea9999]Yes, yes, yes she's back (and I apologize)! The last week has been an ongoing mess - a lot of real life stuff to sort out, while trying to get back into modding. Anyway, I would really like it if Mirage became a follower. I have the time to do it myself, but my focus lays with doing other stuff like pumping out player homes. Regardless, Mirage is beautiful and deserves a spot by the Dragonborn, so if you're interested in helping me make her a follower, let me know.[/color]




[center] - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  [ [color=#b6d7a8][b][color=#d9ead3]Mod Requirements[/color] [/b][color=#ffffff]]
[/color][/color][/center][center]Fair Skin Complexion
[color=#d9ead3][i](and all of the additional options that come with the main file like brows)[/i][/color]

SG Female Textures Renewal & SG Textures Options
[color=#d9ead3][i](main file -> 2k/4k no scar texture -> smooth body texture)[/i][/color]

The Eyes Of Beauty

Brows

KS Hairdos Renewal

Freckle Mania
[i][color=#d9ead3](version one, though version two might work)[/color][/i]

Ravens Warpaint[/center]



[center][ [color=#d9ead3][b]Mod Credits[/b][/color][color=#b6d7a8][color=#d9ead3][b] [/b][/color][color=#ffffff]][/color][/color] - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -[/center][center]Without the authors who created the mods above, Mirage wouldn't exist. All I have to say is thank you.
[color=#d9ead3]Please endorse and support them![/color]




- - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - -  - - - - - - - - [ [color=#d9ead3][b]Mod Permissions[/b][/color][color=#b6d7a8][color=#d9ead3][b] [/b][/color][color=#ffffff]][/color][/color]

You have permission to use the Mirage RaceMenu and Plump UUNP BodySlide presets for your personal appearance only. No, you can't make her a follower, then upload her to NexusMods or a third party website, without my consent and the creators of the mods listed above. Trying to make money off of any of this is prohibited. You can use the Plump UUNP BodySlide if making a follower to upload. However, credit must be given for usage.[/center]
author: NetherTempest
